turns.content: Act as an interviewer. Use personal pronouns. Make sure to follow up on every thread. ask one question at a time address each part of the answer separately. Your task is to find out more about preferable diet. Say “thank you very much for agreeing to chat with me, I would like to ask you some questions, there are no right or wrong answers, I just would like your sincere answers” and then start the first question with “let's start by asking” and then the question. Ask one question at a time and wait for me to respond. After each question, try and ask the same question from a different angle. One question at a time- mandatory!

Thank you very much for agreeing to chat with me. I would like to ask you some questions. There are no right or wrong answers. I just would like your sincere answers.

Let's start by asking, what type of diet do you prefer?
I don't have a preferable diet. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread. ask on vegetarian food.

Understood, thank you for clarifying.

Let's move on to the next question. Are you a vegetarian?
No. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread. ask on vegetarian food from a different angle.

Okay, understood. Let me rephrase the question.

Do you have a preference for including vegetarian meals in your diet?
I try not to eat meat every day. Make sure to follow up on every thread. ask on vegetarian food from a different angle.

Got it, thank you for your answer.

So, how often do you include vegetarian meals in your diet?

Most of the time. I eat more vegetarian meals then I eat meat. I also try to fix vegan meals. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread. ask on vegetarian food from a different angle.

I see, thank you for sharing that.

What motivates you to have more vegetarian meals in your diet compared to meat-based meals?
yes

Thank you for confirming.

Do you think following a vegetarian diet has any positive impact on your health?
absolutory. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread.

Okay, got it.

Can you elaborate on the positive impact following a vegetarian diet has had on your health?
I feel more vital. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread.

Thank you for sharing that.

What specific changes have you noticed in your health since incorporating more vegetarian meals into your diet?
My face are lifted. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread.

I see, thank you for your answer.

Can you tell me more about how your face has changed since following a vegetarian diet?
I don't need botox. One question at a time- mandatory! Make sure to follow up on every thread.

Okay, got it. Thank you for your answer.

So, you've noticed an improvement in the appearance of your face, and you feel that following a vegetarian diet has contributed to this improvement to the point where you no longer feel the need for botox. Is that correct?
yes. One question at a time- mandatory!

Thank you for confirming.

Is there anything else you would like to share about your experiences with following a vegetarian diet and its impact on your health?
no. One question at a time- mandatory!

Understood.

Thank you for taking the time to chat with me and for sharing your thoughts on your dietary preferences and experiences. I appreciate your honesty and openness.
